North Korea's Kim oversees firing drills with 'super-large' rocket launchers, state media saysNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un has overseen firing drills by artillery units in the western region involving "newly-equipped super-large" multiple rocket launchers, state media KCNA said on Tuesday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 22:34:25 GMT S3SCW3GCU5JGLIXY42F637VJ4E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-oversees-firing-drills-with-super-large-rocket-launchers-state-2024-03-18/Hyonhee Shin世界亚太地区
UK closer to passing Rwanda asylum law after changes overturnedBritish Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's contentious bill to deport asylum seekers to Rwanda moved closer to becoming law on Monday after his government rejected all the proposed changes from the upper house of parliament. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 22:28:18 GMT 44YHADD5HRLNLPAI4MMVNHTV4M https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-closer-passing-rwanda-asylum-law-after-changes-overturned-2024-03-18/Andrew Macaskill世界英国
UK royal Kate shown in first video since surgery, Sun saysKate, Britain's Princess of Wales, has been shown looking fit and healthy in the first video taken of her since she underwent surgery two months ago in footage published by the Sun newspaper on its website on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 22:10:22 GMT U5Q5FOVHOZIHJO3LZ5QR3TC234 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-royal-kate-shown-first-video-since-surgery-sun-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界英国
Trudeau raises concern over Israel's planned Rafah offensiveCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Monday expressed concern around Israel's planned offensive in the southern Gaza city of Rafah in a call with Israeli war cabinet member Benny Gantz, Trudeau's office said in a statement. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 21:36:14 GMT 26YVAXJ2PBKJPOPUN52ZUTKFUA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/trudeau-raises-concern-over-israels-planned-offective-rafah-2024-03-18/Kanishka Singh世界美洲
Russia's delegation led by vice culture minister arrives in North Korea, KCNA saysA delegation led by Russia's vice culture minister and including an art troupe arrived in North Korea on Monday, the official KCNA news agency said on Tuesday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 21:32:08 GMT NNOSBTZMUBMFHPNAXK7BOJ5R6A https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russias-delegation-led-by-vice-culture-minister-arrives-north-korea-kcna-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界
To have peace, Europe must prepare for war, EU council president saysEurope must strengthen its defence capabilities and shift to a "war economy" mode in response to the threat posed by Russia, European Council President Charles Michel said on Monday. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 21:19:59 GMT 3NJSV3PGJ5JUHOVB6OZPF3KDAA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/have-peace-europe-must-prepare-war-eu-council-president-says-2024-03-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Iraqi Kurdish KDP says it will boycott regional electionThe ruling Kurdistan Democratic Party (KDP) said on Monday it would boycott a parliamentary election in the semi-autonomous Kurdistan Region of Iraq scheduled to be held in June in protest over a ruling issued by the federal supreme court. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 21:09:21 GMT UZIPZTVV2NLMNNET3OPJMWGMAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iraqi-kurdish-kdp-says-it-will-boycott-regional-election-2024-03-18/Ahmed Rasheed世界中东
US Senator Graham says Ukraine aid depends on conditions, domestic issuesU.S. Senator Lindsey Graham said on Monday, after meeting Ukraine's president, that he was confident an aid package stalled in the U.S. Congress would soon be approved, but called for aid to take the form of a low-interest, waivable loan. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 20:56:18 GMT 265DQ4UVJZOSZIH3LXIVOPL2QI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senator-graham-says-ukraine-aid-depends-conditions-domestic-issues-2024-03-18/Reuters世界美国
Trump wants to appeal Georgia ruling that kept prosecutor on his caseDonald Trump on Monday asked a Georgia judge to allow him to appeal a ruling keeping the lead prosecutor on the state's criminal case against the former U.S. president over his attempts to overturn his election defeat. Mon, 18 Mar 2024 20:02:44 GMT QL2E44GMTNMS3CAWL2NGV5XK6I https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-seeks-appeal-georgia-prosecutor-disqualification-ruling-2024-03-18/Andrew Goudsward世界美国
Mexico presidential candidate Sheinbaum vows to boost state energy sectorMexican presidential candidate Claudia Sheinbaum on Monday vowed to keep boosting the activity of the country's state-owned energy companies, while also accelerating the transition to renewable energies. Congo court sentences journalist Stanis Bujakera to six months in jailA court in the Democratic Republic of Congo on Monday found Congolese journalist Stanis Bujakera guilty of spreading false information among other charges, and sentenced him to six months in prison, his lawyer said.
